artstationapplication

Class Bezier

  • java.lang.Object
    • artstationapplication.Shape
      • artstationapplication.Bezier

  • public class Bezier
extends Shape
    Creates editable Bezier with handles for start, end, and their controllers.
    Author:
    Justin Wilder
